claim: Cell- and egg-based flu vaccines have the potential to develop mutations during production, which may reduce their effectiveness.
explanation: Document header from the CDC's Morbidity and Mortality Weekly Report (MMWR), showing the title, volume, issue number, and date. does not support the claim because the image contains only the report's header and provides no information about mutations in cell- or egg-based flu vaccine production or their effectiveness. Note: Analysis limited by the fact that only the document header is visible; no substantive content is shown.
